explains: n. 锦标赛，联赛；（中世纪的）骑士比武大会；阅兵式
wordGroup: tournament director 竞赛主任；比赛指导

sentences.en: She sprang a surprise by winning the tournament.
sentences.cn: 这次比赛她获得冠军，爆了个大冷门。

sentences.en: After all, The Masters is an invitational tournament.
sentences.cn: 毕竟，这项大师赛是一场邀请赛。

sentences.en: All the country's leading players snubbed the tournament.
sentences.cn: 全国的顶尖运动员都抵制那次比赛。
